helpDescription.overview: Welcome to our map app! We aim to provide comprehensive place information services. Across Taiwan you can use this app for general navigation. We are piloting an "Accessible Friendly Map" program in Taipei City first and will gradually expand to more cities in the future.

general.title:
1. General features across Taiwan: basic search and navigation
In all cities you can use the following basic features:
features: Search places: enter a business name, attraction, or address in the search box above to find the desired location.
Route planning: after finding a place, click the navigation feature and the app will plan a route for you, working similarly to standard navigation apps.

taipei.title: 2. Taipei pilot features: Accessible Map (note: the following features are currently limited to Taipei City)

features.filter: Within Taipei City, click the "Filter" icon at the top-right of the map to quickly find friendly locations based on facilities such as "Accessible Restroom", "Accessible Ramp", or "Elevator".

icons: Accessible restroom: indicates the location has a spacious restroom equipped with grab bars.
Accessible ramp: indicates the main entrance of the location is level or has a ramp.
Elevator / Lift: indicates the location has an elevator or vertical lift equipment.

feedback.title:
3. How to report issues or provide suggestions
Your feedback helps us improve:
steps: Click the "Menu" icon in the top-left and select "Feedback".
Fill in the details of your issue or suggestion and submit.
examples: Accessibility info (Taipei): "The accessible ramp at A Cafe has been removed."
Navigation (all regions): "Route planning was incorrect when navigating in Taichung."
Suggest a new place (Taipei): "Recommend Taipei's B Restaurant — they have an accessible restroom."

items.question: Q: Why can't I find any accessibility icons or filter options in my city (not Taipei)?
items.answer: A: The accessible map feature is currently in a pilot phase and prioritizes data collection and optimization for Taipei City. We are working to expand the database and will gradually enable accessibility information for more cities. In the meantime, you can still use the app's general place search and navigation functions in other cities. Thank you for your support and patience!

items.question: Q: Why don't I see updates immediately after submitting accessibility information for Taipei?
items.answer: A: Thank you for your report! To ensure accuracy, all submissions undergo manual review by our team, which takes some time. Please wait patiently for the update to appear.

items.question: Q: I didn't receive the email confirmation sent by the system?
items.answer: A: Please check your spam folder first. If you still haven't received it, go to the "Profile" page in "Settings" and verify that the email address you registered is correct.

settingDesc: Adjust preferences such as dark mode, language, and font size.
selectAccessible: Please select an accessibility facility type to view
rampDesc: Provides accessible ramps for wheelchair users and strollers, with slopes that meet accessibility design standards.
elevatorDesc: Provides accessible elevators for wheelchair users and people with mobility impairments, equipped with voice prompts and tactile buttons.
toiletDesc: Public restrooms equipped with accessibility features for people with disabilities.
